resources.string:
1. Enter thr complete class names in "BRANCH_year_SECTION" format.

 2. In incharge section, Enter the subject along with the class name separated by "-". Example : CSE_2_A-DSC++.

 3. in last two sections, separate different classes and subjects with a comma(,).

 4. Check all the details before uploading.

 5. While entering other classes and subjects, end the feild with ", " (comma space).
